name: My Lord's Zoological Society
description: This game is about collecting animals. To do this you collect gold, food, and hire professionals. Miners cost 10 to purchase and produce 1 gold/min. Farmers cost 10 gold initially and an additional 1 gold/min. Farmers when paid their 1 gold/min produce 1 food/min. Zookeepers cost 10 gold at first and 1 per minute. Zookeepers feed 1 animal a food every minute. A fully fed animal will provide earnings, while a dead animals will haunt you forever. There are 15 diffrent animals in the game.
